Summary of evidence:
Prognostic factors for survival in primary urethral carcinoma are: age, gender, race, tumour stage and 
grade, nodal stage, presence of distant metastasis, histological type, tumour size, tumour location, 
concomitant bladder cancer and type and modality of treatment.
In locally-advanced urothelial- and SCC of the urethra, treatment in academic centres improves OS.
